name: Sky Burns Red
description:
Welcome to the world's only rhythm-balancing game! You're the world's best post-rock band, Sky Burns Red, and you're having the most thematic concert - at a ran-down old platform in the woods. Just perfect... aside from the way it kinda falls over when you have a lot of people on it. Never matter, you can just keep it standing up yourself!

Play TWO songs, one with three different difficulties, as you try to keep the platform up.

Use the left and right arrow keys, A and D, or left and right bumpers, to hit the notes and push the platform up. Collect powerups by hitting the correct direction! The wrench fixes the platform, and the happy face makes the crowd happier! If the crowd gets angry, they'll destroy the platform!

Controls:

Left - A, Left Arrow, Left D-Pad, or Left Bumper

Right - D, Right Arrow, Right D-Pad, or Right Bumper

There's also a beatmap editor mode. You can only use the threeish pieces of music included with the game, but you can indeed beatmap them yourself!

Editor Controls

Up - Up Arrow, W

Down - Down Arrow, D

Add Note - Space

Add Left Powerup 1 - U

Add Left Powerup 2 - I

Add Right Powerup 1 - O

Add Right Powerup 2 - P
